message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18000. It's a great deal, and I believe you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $15000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I understand your position. While your offer is appreciated, it's still a bit lower than what I need to make this worthwhile. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $16500. This would ensure a fair deal for both of us and allow us to complete the transaction. Let's find a way to make this work!

Thank you for your response, Alice. I'm glad we're finding common ground here. I'd like to propose an offer of $16000 for your product. I believe this strikes a balance between our positions and allows for a fair transaction. I look forward to your consideration.
